title: Limeade

ingredients.content: 7 ½ oz limes (approx. 3 lg. limes) peel and pith removed, quartered

preparations.content: Place sugar into mixing bowl and grind <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add limes and 18 oz water, hold measuring cup in place and crush <b>2 sec/speed 10<b>, then crush a further <b>2 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add remaining 18 oz water. Insert simmering basket, hold it in place with spatula and strain lime water into a pitcher. Add ice cubes and serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: If less pulp is preferred: strain through a fine mesh sieve before adding ice, then serve.
